actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to strengthen the penalty provisions of the Gun Control Act of 1968.

summary.text: Provides, for the offense of using or unlawfully carrying a firearm during the commission of a felony, for a term of imprisonment of not less than five nor more than ten years in addition to the punishment provided for the felony. Enumerates exceptions to such provision. Establishes additional penalties for repeated offenses.

titles.title: A bill to strengthen the penalty provisions of the Gun Control Act of 1968.
